comments.body: This issue also happens when testing with a native Android project on Droid 3. It is not a Titanium bug. Motorola changed attribute values for built-in themes on their devices. Here are some similar discussion http://stackoverflow.com/questions/7245923/listview-background-is-grey-on-droid-3

Image is not shown on other devices like Samung GALAXY Tab 620	Android 3.2 and LG-P970	Android 2.2.2 as well.
